explains: n. （倒塌的墙或建筑留下的）瓦砾，碎石；（建房铺路用的）碎石
wordGroup: rubble mound 毛石堆；毛石基；堆石斜坡堤

sentences.en: The bomb reduced the houses to rubble.
sentences.cn: 炸弹把那片房子炸成了一堆瓦砾。

sentences.en: A gang of workmen were shovelling rubble onto a truck.
sentences.cn: 一帮工人正用铁锹往卡车上装碎石。

sentences.en: Thousands of bodies are still buried under the rubble.
sentences.cn: 数千具尸体还埋在瓦砾下。
